detailedSolution:
Starting with the triangle with the point labeled <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A</annotation></semantics></math>, the triangle is translated point by point 3 units to the right and 3 units up to point <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <msup>
    <mi>A</mi>
    <mo>′</mo>
  </msup>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A'</annotation></semantics></math>. Then, the triangle labeled <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <msup>
    <mi>A</mi>
    <mo>′</mo>
  </msup>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A'</annotation></semantics></math> is translated 3 units to the right and 3 units up to point <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <msup>
    <mi>A</mi>
    <mo>″</mo>
  </msup>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A''</annotation></semantics></math>.
